GR13devikapu:1: deveśa jñānamācāraṃ kṛpayā kathayasva me // Dka_1 //
GR13devikapu:4: praviśanti yato mokṣaṃ jñānino dhvastakalmaṣam // Dka_2 //
GR13devikapu:6: na teṣāṃ jāyate bodhaḥ śāstrakoṭiśatairapi // Dka_3 //
GR13devikapu:7: ato hi nirbhayo vidvān niḥśaṅko vigataspṛhaḥ /
GR13devikapu:11: sa brahmā sa śivo viṣṇuḥ sa indraḥ sa ṣaḍānanaḥ /
GR13devikapu:12: sa guruḥ sarvadevāśca sa yogī sa tapodhanaḥ // Dka_6 //
GR13devikapu:14: caladvāyusamaṃ cittaṃ dhriyate yena niścalam // Dka_7 //
GR13devikapu:16: sā prajñā tadiha sthairyaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ vyavasāyinām // Dka_8 //
GR13devikapu:17: tadeva tīrthaṃ dānaṃ ca sa tapaśca na saṃśayaḥ /
GR13devikapu:19: citte calati saṃsāro niścalo mokṣa eva tu /
GR13devikapu:20: tasmāccittaṃ sthiraṃ kuryāt prajñayā parayā budhaḥ // Dka_10 //
GR13devikapu:22: niṣkarmaṇi pare tattve ko na rajyeta paṇḍitaḥ // Dka_11 //
GR13devikapu:32: rūpamityādikaṃ kiñcid dhyeyaṃ naiva kadācana // Dka_16 //
GR13devikapu:35: nātra pūjā namaskāro na japo dhyānameva ca /
GR13devikapu:36: kevalaṃ jñānamityuktaṃ veditavyaṃ na kiñcana // Dka_18 //
GR13devikapu:38: bahiścittaṃ nivāryaiva vindan loke na sīdati // Dka_19 //
GR13devikapu:39: nātra kiñcidbahirnāntaṃ na madhyaṃ nāpyadhaḥ kvacit /
GR13devikapu:42: tadgatirjāyate yasmān nirālokaṃ tu cintayet // Dka_21 //
GR13devikapu:43: heturnāsti phalaṃ nāsti nāsti karma svabhāvataḥ /
GR13devikapu:44: asadbhūtamidaṃ sarvaṃ nāsti loko na laukikaḥ // Dka_22 //
GR13devikapu:47: vyomākāraṃ mahāśūnyaṃ vyāpakaṃ yo na bhāvayet /
GR13devikapu:50: yogaṃ sālambanaṃ tyaktvā niṣprapañcaṃ vicintayet // Dka_25 //
GR13devikapu:52: bhagnaṃ yaiḥ śūnyamantreṇa te smṛtāḥ śūnyavedinaḥ // Dka_26 //
GR13devikapu:64: sarvasmādbhinna evāhaṃ cintayan labhate citam // Dka_32 //
GR13devikapu:66: bodhayitvā prayatnena kuryāt svasthaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Dka_33 //
GR13devikapu:68: na kiñciccintayet tatra sthirameva tu kārayet // Dka_34 //
GR13devikapu:70: cañcalaṃ niścalaṃ kuryāt niścalaṃ na tu cālayet // Dka_35 //
GR13devikapu:72: tattadrūpaṃ svakaṃ dhyāyed vyāptaṃ caiva tu nirmalam // Dka_36 //
GR13devikapu:74: caladvāyusamaṃ cittaṃ niścalaṃ dhriyate hi yat // Dka_37 //
GR13devikapu:75: naivordhvaṃ dhārayeccittaṃ na madhyaṃ nāpyadhaḥ kvacit /
GR13devikapu:82: yajjñānaṃ jāyate spaṣṭaṃ tadabhyāsaparo bhavet // Dka_41 //
GR13devikapu:83: ye dhyāyanti paraṃ śūnyaṃ niṣkalaṃ niravasthitam /
GR13devikapu:84: te yānti paramaṃ sthānaṃ janmamṛtyuvivarjitam // Dka_42 //
GR13devikapu:85: devā devyastathā cānye dharmādharmau ca tatphalam /
GR13devikapu:89: vairāgyeṇa vapustyāgo na vai kāryo manīṣiṇā /
GR13devikapu:97: ahameko na me kaścin nāhamanyasya kasyacit /
GR13devikapu:98: na taṃ paśyāmi yasyāhaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yo mama // Dka_49 //
GR13devikapu:100: iti syānniścito mukto baddhaḥ syādanyathā pumān // Dka_50 //
GR13devikapu:102: tadā bhavati śāntātmā sarvato vigataspṛhaḥ // Dka_51 //
GR13devikapu:103: yo 'sau sarveṣu śāstreṣu paṭhyate hyaja īśvaraḥ /
GR13devikapu:104: akāyo nirguṇo hyātmā so 'hamasmi na saṃśayaḥ // Dka_52 //
GR13devikapu:105: vijñāptimātro hi sadā viśuddhaḥ sarvatra yasmātsatataṃ vimuktaḥ /
GR13devikapu:106: nādeyaheyo hyahamapratarkyas tasmātsadā brahmamayo viśokaḥ // Dka_53 //
GR13devikapu:109: īśo 'hamevāsya carācarasya pitā ca mātā ca pitāmahaśca /
GR13devikapu:110: dhyānaṃ samāsthāya padaṃ caturthaṃ dhyāyanti māmeva vimuktikāmāḥ // Dka_55 //
GR13devikapu:112: yajñairanekairahameva pūjyo māmeva sarve pratipūjayanti // Dka_56 //
GR13devikapu:114: bhūtāni cāhaṃ sthirajaṅgamāni yāvanti cānyānyahameva tāni // Dka_57 //
GR13devikapu:115: na sthūlasūkṣmo na ca śūnyarūpo jñānaikarūpo jagadekabandhuḥ /
GR13devikapu:119: sanātanaṃ brahma nirantaraṃ yat pade pade so 'hamiti prapaśyet /
GR13devikapu:120: yo bhāvatastiṣṭhati niṣprakampaḥ sa brahmabhūto 'mṛtatāmupaiti // Dka_60 //
GR13devikapu:122: ācāraṃ kathyamānaṃ tu sāmprataṃ śṛṇu taṃ mayā // Dka_61 //
GR13devikapu:123: na snānaṃ na japaḥ pūjā homo naiva ca sādhanam /
GR13devikapu:125: niyamo 'pi na tasyāsti kṣetrapīṭhe ca sevanam /
GR13devikapu:126: nārcanaṃ pitṛkāryādi tīrthayātrā vratāni ca // Dka_63 //
GR13devikapu:130: saṃkalpaṃ ca vikalpaṃ ca ye cānye kuladharmikāḥ // Dka_65 //
GR13devikapu:132: pratyakṣeṇāpi labhyeran naiva gṛhṇīta sādhakaḥ // Dka_66 //
GR13devikapu:134: etairnāsti parā muktiś cidrūpaṃ vyāpakaṃ vinā // Dka_67 //
GR13devikapu:136: kṣetrapīṭhe ca sandehād varjayedyadi kautukam // Dka_68 //
GR13devikapu:138: na nāśayed budho jīvān paramārthamatiryataḥ // Dka_69 //
GR13devikapu:140: bhūtapīḍāṃ na kurvīta puṣpāṇāṃ ca nikṛntanam // Dka_70 //
GR13devikapu:145: samo 'mitre ca mitre ca samo loṣṭe ca kāñcane /
GR13devikapu:146: abhilāṣo na kartavya indriyārthe kadācana // Dka_73 //
GR13devikapu:150: vivādaṃ lokagoṣṭhīṃ ca kalahāśca vivarjayet // Dka_75 //
GR13devikapu:152: īrṣyāṃ paiśunyadambhe ca rāgaṃ mātsaryameva ca /
GR13devikapu:153: kāmakrodhau bhayaṃ śokaṃ tyajetsarvaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // Dka_77 //
GR13devikapu:155: anenaiva śarīreṇa sarvajñaḥ san prakāśate // Dka_78 //
GR13devikapu:159: tathāpi mucyate dehī patiṃ vijñāya nirmalam // Dka_80 //
GR13devikapu:162: īdṛśaṃ jñāninaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GR13devikapu:163: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ dhūpaṃ snānaṃ vastraṃ ca bhojanam // Dka_82 //
GR13devikapu:167: yajjñānācaraṇaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ kathitaṃ mayā /
